# Index Estimation for the NWFSC WCGBT Survey {#wcgbt-index-settings}

Maturity samples for a wide range of West Coast groundfish species have been collected across a range of sources: NWFSC WCGBT survey, NWFSC HKL survey, Pacific hake survey, at-sea sampling of the Pacific hake fishery, and port sampling by ODFW and WDFW. Samples have been collected between 2009 - 2022. The following summary does not include collection from the 2023 NWFSC WCGBT and HKL surveys.   


```{r survey, results="asis"}

survey <- read.csv('C:/Users/Chantel.Wetzel/Documents/GitHub/indexwc/data-raw/configuration.csv')
survey_mat <- survey[c(-2, -10, -11, -12), c("species", "family", "formula", "min_depth", "max_depth", "min_latitude", 
                             "max_latitude", "spatiotemporal1", "spatiotemporal2")]
survey_mat[, "family"] <- gsub("sdmTMB::", "", survey_mat[, "family"])
col_names <- gsub("_", " ", colnames(survey_mat))
ind <- order(survey_mat$species)

sa4ss::table_format(
  x = survey_mat[ind, ], 
  caption = "Setting used for estimating indices of abundance for the NWFSC WCGBT survey by species.",
  label = 'survey-settings',
  col_names = col_names,
  landscape = TRUE,
  font_size = 7,
  custom_width = TRUE,
	col_to_adjust = 1:ncol(survey),
  width = c('0.1 cm', rep('2.5 cm', 2), rep('4 cm', 1), rep('1 cm', nrow(survey_mat) - 4)),
  align = 'l')


```
